item.title: Upchk - Python script for monitoring host online/offline status
item.description: I wrote a Python script that pings hosts and reports the changes in their online/offline status via email. It works on it’s own built-in times as opposed to cron and uses Python built-in smtp lib, removing dependency on postfix/sendmail. It’s also cross-platform (Linux/Windows/Mac), although I mainly tested it on Linux, because that’s what I use. Code’s here.
